attributes.action: immediately acknowledge the public outrage caused by the amount of detail removed from the published expenses of MPs and order that the full details - TOTALLY UNREDACTED - be promulgated so that the people who are funding this fraud can see who stole the money and what they used it for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The publication, yesterday, of MPs expense forms and receipts was a complete waste of effort (and a totally unjustifiable waste of however much carbon was produced through doing it)and shows that the government consider the people who are paying for this are children who need to be kept in their place.  Were this France, Germany or Iran there would be hundreds of thousands of people rioting in the streets - this might happen yet in this country!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
